subject: Football (College)
Colleges and Universities
Scholarships and Fellowships
lead_paragraph: By restoring Penn State’s bowl eligibility and full complement of scholarships, the N.C.A.A. launched the program that was shamed by a sexual-abuse scandal on a course to normalcy.
snippet: By restoring Penn State’s bowl eligibility and full complement of scholarships, the N.C.A.A. launched the program that was shamed by a sexual-abuse scandal on a course to normalcy.
